title: JBL Wave 200 TWS, Bluetooth Truly Wireless in Ear Earbuds
description: JBL DEEP BASS SOUND: Feel the sound with the Deep Bass powered by the 8mm Dynamic drivers and add fun to your routine. UPTO 20 HOURS OF PLAYTIME: With 5 hours in the earbuds and 15 hours in the case, the JBL Wave 200 TWS don’t drop until you do. DUAL CONNECT TECHNOLOGY: With the Dual Connect Technology on the Wave 200 TWS, take calls or listen to music with single earbud (or both). Choose which one to use and leave the other one in the case to save battery life. TOUCH CONTROLS FOR CALLS AND VOICE ASSISTANT: Just a touch of the earbud is what you need to control calls, sound or your mobile device’s voice assistant and stay in touch with your world.
